title: ODI - Unlocking the Power of Good Data Governance
description: Comprehensive guide exploring the four pillars of data governance: data quality, security, management, and access, with practical examples.

title: ODI - The Softer Side of Data Governance: A Playbook for Non-Technical Users
description: Practical playbook making data governance accessible beyond technical roles, with guidance on accessing, using, sharing, and communicating about data.

title: ODI - Designing a Framework for Responsible Data Stewardship
description: Framework covering dimensions such as equity, ethics, engagement, openness, transparency and sustainability in data stewardship.

title: ODI - Understanding Data Governance in AI Series
description: Report series examining data governance frameworks throughout AI development, covering the AI data lifecycle and governance considerations.

title: ODI - Data Ethics Canvas
description: Practical tool for identifying and managing ethical issues during the design, development, delivery and review of data-based projects.

title: European Commission - Data Protection Overview
description: Comprehensive overview of EU data protection legislation including GDPR, with guidance and implementation resources.
category: European Data Protection and Legal Frameworks

title: European Data Protection Board (EDPB) - Guidelines and Best Practices
description: Official guidelines clarifying GDPR application and promoting common understanding across EU member states.
category: European Data Protection and Legal Frameworks

title: GDPR.eu - General Data Protection Regulation Compliance Guidelines
description: Straightforward, up-to-date information resource helping organizations achieve GDPR compliance, with practical guidance.
category: European Data Protection and Legal Frameworks

title: OECD - Going Digital Guide to Data Governance Policy Making
description: Comprehensive guide helping policymakers navigate fundamental policy tensions: balancing data openness and control, managing overlapping regulations, and incentivizing investment in data.
